title: Episode 197: Modern Art And Subversive Faith with Matt Milliner
description: We live in an image-drenched culture. When is “breaking” culture a part of our Christian calling, and how does Christian faith equip us to subvert our image-saturated “Babylon?” Art historian Matthew Milliner joins Phil and Skye to talk art, consumerism, and “occupying the optocracy.” This week on the podcast!
content:encoded: We live in an image-drenched culture.
